body_html:
BTW, I'm changing the environment variable in #9579 to set the desired capability instead of selectively disabling them. So to use the generic kernels, it'll be:

ATEN_CPU_CAPABILITY=default

instead of

ATEN_DISABLE_AVX=1 ATEN_DISABLE_AVX2=1
body_text:
BTW, I'm changing the environment variable in #9579 to set the desired capability instead of selectively disabling them. So to use the generic kernels, it'll be:
ATEN_CPU_CAPABILITY=default
instead of
ATEN_DISABLE_AVX=1 ATEN_DISABLE_AVX2=1
body:
BTW, I'm changing the environment variable in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/9579 to set the desired capability instead of selectively disabling them. So to use the generic kernels, it'll be:

`ATEN_CPU_CAPABILITY=default`

instead of

`ATEN_DISABLE_AVX=1 ATEN_DISABLE_AVX2=1`
